title: verify multi tenant data isolation and role based access control
description: Test that the multi-tenant architecture enforces strict data isolation between different travel agencies and that role-based access control correctly restricts access to resources based on user roles (admin, staff, customer).

title: test user authentication and authorization flows
description: Verify that user authentication using JWT and password hashing with bcrypt works correctly, including login, token issuance, token validation, and access to protected routes.

title: validate company registration and auto generated company codes
description: Ensure that new companies can register successfully and receive unique auto-generated company codes for multi-tenant onboarding.

title: test reservation management crud and calendar view
description: Verify that reservation CRUD operations function correctly, reservation statuses update properly, and reservations are displayed accurately in calendar view including transport arrangements.

title: validate customer account management and password control
description: Test customer account creation, profile updates, transaction history retrieval, and password management functionalities.

title: verify financial management multi currency and transaction logging
description: Ensure cash flow tracking, payment type configuration, debt/credit management, multi-currency support, and transaction logging work as expected with real-time currency updates.

title: test stripe integration for module purchases and webhook handling
description: Validate that Stripe Checkout integration allows module purchases, processes payments correctly, and webhook events are handled without failures.

title: validate hotel ics calendar synchronization and push reservation retries
description: Test that hotel ICS calendar synchronization pulls external calendar data correctly, and that reservation push operations to hotels use retry queues for failed attempts.

title: verify reporting modules generate accurate reports
description: Ensure that all reporting modules generate accurate and comprehensive reports for income, expenses, performance, customer analysis, reservations, and profit/loss.

title: test administrative features and module switching interface
description: Verify that staff management, company profile updates, system settings, security settings, and module switching interface function correctly for administrators.
